alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:25AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, northeastern Hamilton, eastern Echols, central Ware, Clinch and west central Charlton Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1025 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mayday to Jasper to Wellborn. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Fargo, Argyle, Du Pont, Needmore and Manor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
